mapper.select: select user1.image,user1.nickName,user_detail.realName,user_detail.email,user1.telephone,user_detail.addressDesc,user_detail.descr from user1 LEFT JOIN user_detail ON user1.Id = user_detail.id where user1.Id = #{id}
select user_task.desc,user_task.status,user_task.finishTime from user_skill LEFT JOIN user_task ON user_skill.userId = user_task.workerId where user_skill.userId = #{userId}

select user1.name1,user1.nickName,user1.telephone,user_detail.realName,user_detail.cardNo,user1.sex,user_detail.birthday,user_detail.email,city.name,user_detail.addressDesc,user_detail.descr from user_detail LEFT JOIN user1 ON user_detail.Id = user1.Id LEFT JOIN city ON user_detail.address = city.code where user_detail.Id = #{userId}
